Title: Verano azul
Actors: Antonio Ferrandis, María Garralón, Pilar Torres
Plot: This series is about the adventures of a bunch of youngsters during their summer holiday in a small town on the Southern Coast of Spain. The seven kids: Quique, Javi, Pancho, Bea, Desi, Tito, and Piraña, with at age range of 8 to ...
